description.name: wethsol
description.tagline: Wrapped Ether Solana Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto sol-weth Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept Wrapped Ether Solana directly on your website
Unique sol/weth receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your sol/weth wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
